title: 3 and Out - Russ/Kyler Frantic Finish; Joe Judge Gets Nuts; Chargers Need Urban; Gruden Payoff; NFL Week 11 Preview and 3 for the $ ATS Picks
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Russ/Kyler Frantic Finish; Joe Judge Gets Nuts; Chargers Need Urban; Gruden Payoff; NFL Week 11 Preview and 3 for the $ ATS Picks
description:
In this episode, John reacts to the Seahawks thrilling TNF win over the Cardinals, why Pete Carroll teams have an undeniable track record of coming out on top in crazy endings, why he respects Joe Judge reportedly toeing up with his o-line coach, why the Chargers should try to swing big and try to hire Urban Meyer, and why he thinks Jon Gruden needs to make the playoffs. He also previews the NFL week 11 slate and gives his 3 for the $ ATS picks. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
